column4: aquarius..I think that'll need decidated video for the other mointor which laptops usually don't even have
the vga port is usually mirroring only I believe
really? Oh. X doesn't support different resolutions on the two monitors?
I can't imagine why it would be a problem, unless you switch while it's in the middle of working out what your keyboard is...
probably. But if you're worried about it then don't do it; I could well be wrong, because I'm just guessing...
